N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.13 - Holder connections and piping

State Regulations

Valves for connections to holders including relief valves
for pressure tanks shall be inspected and tested for opening, closing and
leakage at least twice a year. All necessary adjustments and repairs shall be
made to restore each item to a high operating efficiency. Gate valves on inlet
and outlet connections shall be tested for free movement, and inspection for
lubrication of stems and condition of packing at least once a week. Where
practicable, control valves shall be provided on inlet and outlet connections
at a point distant from the holder, and inlet, outlet and by-pass valves shall
be motorized. All piping in proximity to holders shall where practicable be
placed underground. Notes
